div.p: Used to indicate that the target of the relationship will be a filtered subset of the total related set of targets.
Used when there is a need to limit the number of components to the first, the last, the next, the total, the average or some other filtered or calculated subset.

valueString.value: Lock all vaue sets untouched since 2014-03-26 to trackingId 2014T1_2014_03_26

description.value: Used to indicate that the target of the relationship will be a filtered subset of the total related set of targets. Used when there is a need to limit the number of components to the first, the last, the next, the total, the average or some other filtered or calculated subset.
